skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.LaunchProjectileOnTargets
skill.description:
For an agent to launch a specified quantity of projectiles on a given set of targets. The agent launches projectile on each target by following the order of the elements into the 'targets' list.
A target won't be hit (unit cannot launch projectile) if agent doesn't have the physical capability (no adapted launcher regarding to dotation type) or if it hasn't enough dotation). In that specific case, agent will decide to act on the next target.
If a position is issued (optional) agent will try to launch projectiles from it (same position for all the targets). If not, agent move toward each target (by following the order of the elements into the 'targets' list) until it can launche the projectile. In some cases (long range type of projectiles) agent won't need to move.

parameter.name: targets
parameter.description: The set of targets to launch projectiles on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resourse to use (optional). Default value is 1.

parameter.name: dotationType
parameter.description: The type of projectile (resource dotation type) to launch to hit each of the targets.

parameter.name: position
parameter.description: The (optional) position from which the agent launches the projectiles on each target (same position for all targets).

link.name: launchProjectile
link.description: To enact the decision to launch projectiles on each target.
